song.title: Turquoise
song.info:
"The original name of this one was 'Funk for Sodomizers', but Tempest suggested that it's not a suitable name for a 'serious' compo tune. :) I suppose I was still pretty much into pure funk at the time, no disco in this one."
Ranked 6th in the multichannel music compo at Assembly '2k held in Hartwall Areena, Helsinki, Finland from 3rd to 6th August, 2000.
